definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: To do my duty, for the good of mankind in general.
sentences.chinese: 要善盡職責，爲全人類謀求福祉。

sentences.english: The well-being of societies is directly linked to the health and survival of mothers and children.
sentences.chinese: 母親和兒童的健康和生存直接關係到整個社會的福祉。

sentences.english: For the welfare of common people, this matter must be blocked.
sentences.chinese: 爲了蒼生的福祉，這事一定要被阻止。

sentences.english: "zone of "the" first, "second, " third and fourth in line with all the well-being.
sentences.chinese: 區一，二，三和四是符合所有福祉。

sentences.english: Or is it that she is willing to sacrifice her family's well-being for the good of the country and personal ambition?
sentences.chinese: 難道她願意爲國家福祉和個人抱負而犧牲家庭幸福嗎？

sentences.english: This is a state and national well-being of ups and downs of life and death choices.
sentences.chinese: 這是關係國家盛衰和國民福祉的生死選擇。

sentences.english: For making peace with the deceased, one can also share merits for their well-being.
sentences.chinese: 與逝者和解的人也可以分享其福祉功德。

sentences.english: The reduction of car exhaust is good for all mankind.
sentences.chinese: 降低汽車的排氣量是爲了全人類的福祉。

sentences.english: We know that water scarcity has a direct impact on human health and well-being.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道，缺水直接影響人類健康和福祉。

sentences.english: And seeing others' suffering when considering your chauvinistic interests of great America.
sentences.chinese: 在考慮大美沙文利益的時候想想世界的福祉。

sentences.english: One of the blessings of the old-time Sabbath was its calm, its restfulness, its holy peace.
sentences.chinese: 古代安息日的福祉之一，就是它的幽寂與安靜。

sentences.english: Think through all the many blessings and benefits the Lord has heaped upon you.
sentences.chinese: 徹底的想清楚耶和華集於你身的所有祝福和福祉。

sentences.english: One of the purposes of China's one-child policy is to improve child wellbeing.
sentences.chinese: 中國推行計劃生育政策的目的之一就是增進兒少福祉。

sentences.english: Parents migrate to improve the well-being of their children and other extended family members.
sentences.chinese: 家長移徙是爲了改善子女和其他親屬的生活福祉。

sentences.english: But you cannot have rest, or be perfectly blest, Until all on the altar is laid.
sentences.chinese: 但不能有安息，得不着大福祉，除非你將一切全獻上。

sentences.english: It boosts growth and thus wellbeing.
sentences.chinese: 這様能提高經濟增長，從而福祉社會。

definition: to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
favor from an emperor or high official
